abstract: An article on July 26, 2008, about Russian Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin’s critical comments concerning a steel company, Mechel, and a subsequent sharp drop in that company’s stock price, reported that a former partial owner of Mechel steel, Vladimir Iorikh, had earlier sold his shares and “fled Russia.”.

lead_paragraph: An article on July 26, 2008, about Russian Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin’s critical comments concerning a steel company, Mechel, and a subsequent sharp drop in that company’s stock price, reported that a former partial owner of Mechel steel, Vladimir Iorikh, had earlier sold his shares and “fled Russia.”
